context: Hello, what are your movie preferences?
Hello I love action movies. Do you have any good suggestions?
Well, Die Hard (1988) is an absolute classic, but The Dark Knight Rises (2012) is good for a modern one Have you seen either of those?
No I haven't seen neither what are they about
Die Hard is a Cop that gets trapped in a mall on Christmas by terrorists and has to take them down
resp: How about Inception (2010) or Lethal Weapon (1987) ?
